eLabel.text: Bitte rufen Sie das Plugin auf

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 17), size = (530, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 10), size = (54, 54), png = 3), # index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (71, 46), size = (15, 16), png = 4), # index 4 is the default pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (620, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), # index 1 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 42), size = (620, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular2", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (14, 1), size = (630, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (14, 26), size = (630, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (674, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 15)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (14, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 0), # index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 1), size = (200, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (468, 3), size = (180, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 26), size = (400, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (638, 15), size = (20, 20), png = 4), # index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (673, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 15)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 2), size = (500, 46), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the status pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 34)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (650, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the essid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 43), size = (210, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is the interface MultiContentEntryText(pos = (244, 43), size = (210, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 0 is the encryption MultiContentEntryText(pos = (478, 8), size = (220, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 0 is the signal MultiContentEntryText(pos = (478, 43), size = (220, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 0 is the maxrate ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular2", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"templates": {"default": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (30, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 1), size = (40, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 1), size = (218, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (303, 1), size = (278, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (586, 3), size = (100, 20), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showOnDemand"), "notselected": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (30, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 1), size = (40, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 1), size = (218, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (303, 1), size = (278, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (586, 2), size = (100, 23), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showOnDemand") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (716, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 43), size = (676, 45), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular2", 17)], "itemHeight": 110 }

screen.name: AutoShutDownFile
screen.title: Select a media file for AutoShutDown

screen.name: ExtensionsList
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop
deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height()
height_offset = 8 bottom_offset = 2 listitemheight = 30 width_offset = 10 windowwidth = 650
# calc listheight count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 listheight = listitemheight * count
# calc windowheight windowheight = height_offset + listheight + bottom_offset
# resize window windowsize = (windowwidth, windowheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*windowsize))
# move list listsize = (windowwidth - width_offset * 2, listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window self.instance.move(ePoint((deskwidth - windowwidth)/2, (deskheight - windowheight)/2 + 19))
